node.doctext:
If you have the option enabled to show common bad spellings in your writeups, common bad spellings will be flagged and displayed you are looking at your writeup by itself (as opposed to the e2node, which may contain other noders' writeups).

This option can be toggled at invalidcorrection '; #table body - wrong spellings to correct spellings my $s; my $numShown = 0; foreach(sort(keys(%$spellInfo))) { next if substr($_,0,1) eq '_'; next if $_ eq 'nwing'; ++$numShown; $s = $_; $s =~ tr/_/ /; $str .= ''.$s.''.$$spellInfo{$_}.' '; } #table footer $str .= ' '; $str .= '('.$numShown.' entries'; $str .= ' shown, '.scalar(keys(%$spellInfo)).' total' if $isCE; $str .= ')'; return $str; %]
